how can i install new kde 4, i have gnom: could i type in  terminal sudo apt-get install kde4?
open /etc/apt/sources.list as root. (e.g. sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list in terminal)
add "deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/kubuntu-members-kde4/ubuntu gutsy main" without the quotes to the bottom of it.
I told you to run it as root. :|
then add the deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/kubuntu-members-kde4/ubuntu gutsy main
now type the sudo apt-get update into terminal
tell me when it's done. (may take a while ;D)
In case I'm not hear, there's further instructions available in http://kubuntu.org/announcements/kde-4.0.php
